quirks.description: Greenhouse uses ARIA combobox widgets for dropdowns. These are NOT standard <select> elements.
quirks.workaround: Use click-snapshot-click pattern: 1) Click the combobox to open, 2) Take a page snapshot to find options, 3) Click the matching option element.

quirks.description: Form has invisible reCAPTCHA Enterprise that triggers on submit. Cannot be bypassed programmatically.
quirks.workaround: Prepare a human-in-the-loop fallback. If reCAPTCHA challenge appears, pause and notify user to solve it manually.

quirks.description: Resume upload uses a hidden file input that is triggered by an 'Attach' button overlay.
quirks.workaround: Locate the hidden <input type='file'> near the Attach button and use setInputFiles() directly, or click the Attach button and handle the file dialog.

quirks.description: Greenhouse provides a public API for job listings at boards-api.greenhouse.io.
quirks.workaround: Use GET https://boards-api.greenhouse.io/v1/boards/datadog/jobs to fetch all jobs. Supports ?content=true for full descriptions.

notes: Datadog uses standard Greenhouse application flow. API is publicly accessible for job scraping.
